definition: kitchen appliance that cooks food by passing an electromagnetic wave through it, cook or heat in a microwave oven
details:
noun
- kitchen appliance that cooks food by passing an electromagnetic wave through it
= synonyms: microwave oven
- a short electromagnetic wave (longer than infrared but shorter than radio waves)
= example: a short electromagnetic wave (longer than infrared but shorter than radio waves)
verb
- cook or heat in a microwave oven
= example: cook or heat in a microwave oven
= synonyms: nuke
